mapper.sql: id, bill_code, bill_name, bill_date, work_order_id, group_id, handle_user_id, status, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, sync_time, sync_result, sync_result_time, company_id, workshop_id, line_id
mapper.select: select t.*, t1.order_code as workOrderCode, t1.order_name as workOrderName, t2.depart_name as groupName, t3.realname as handleUserName from bu_material_returned t left join bu_work_order t1 on t1.id = t.work_order_id left join sys_depart t2 on t2.id = t.group_id left join sys_user t3 on t3.id = t.handle_user_id where t.id = #{id}
